suggest.ext-redis: Required to use the Redis queue driver
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SQS queue driver (~3.0).
suggest.iron-io/iron_mq: Required to use the iron queue driver (~2.0).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the beanstalk queue driver (~3.0).
suggest.php-amqplib/php-amqplib: Required to use the RabbitMQ queue driver (~2.6|~3.0)
suggest.kwn/php-rdkafka-stubs: Required to use the Kafka queue driver (~1.1.0)
suggest.enqueue/enqueue: Required to use the Enqueue driver (~0.9)
suggest.symfony/var-dumper: VarDumper could be used for displaying failed message (~4.3|~5.0)
